meanings.definition: Shared by all members of a community
meanings.sent1: The park was a communal space where everyone could gather and play together.
meanings.sent2: The communal garden was tended to by all the neighbors in the area.
meanings.sent3: It was a communal effort to clean up the beach after the storm.
meanings.sent4: The communal spirit in the neighborhood made everyone feel like family.
meanings.sent5: The communal meal brought everyone together in a joyful feast.

meanings.definition: Involving or belonging to a community as a whole
meanings.sent1: The communal decision to build a new playground was well received by all.
meanings.sent2: The communal celebration of the holiday included music, food, and games for everyone.
meanings.sent3: The communal project to paint the community center was a colorful success.
meanings.sent4: The communal effort to fundraise for the school trip was a great example of teamwork.
meanings.sent5: The communal spirit of the town made it a welcoming place for all.

meanings.definition: Relating to a commune or a group living together and sharing possessions
meanings.sent1: The communal living arrangement allowed for shared meals and chores among the residents.
meanings.sent2: The communal decision-making process in the commune ensured that everyone had a voice.
meanings.sent3: Living in a communal space meant always having someone around to chat with.
meanings.sent4: The communal lifestyle promoted a sense of unity and cooperation among the group.
meanings.sent5: The communal values of the community were evident in their daily interactions.
